pageProduct.name: Systane Eye Wash 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Systane Eye Wash Solution for irritated eyes.

Systane Eye Wash is a gentle cleaning solution that can be used to:


- wash away and clean eyes from everyday irritants such as dust, smoke, grit and pollen.


- soothe and refresh sore, tired and uncomfortable eyes.


Eases Irritation.


Cleans, Refreshes and Soothes Sore Eyes.


For Daily Eye Cleaning.


Hygienic, easy-to-use squeeze bottle.


 

Warnings

For external use only.
Sterile until opened.
Tamper evident: For your protection, this bottle has an imprinted seal around the neck. Do not use if seal is broken, damaged or missing at time of purchase.
Do not touch the bottle tip to your eye or to any other surface. This will help to prevent the solution from becoming dirty or contaminated. Replace cap after using.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Do not use to rinse or soak contact lenses. If irritation persists, seek medical advice. If solution changes colour or becomes cloudy, do not use.


Ingredients

Systane Eye Wash contains Aqua, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Acetate (Trihydrate), Sodium Citrate (Dihydrate), Potassium Chloride, Calcium Chloride (Dihydrate), Magnesium Chloride (Hexahydrate), Benzalkonium Chloride Solution, Sodium Hydroxide and/or Hydrochloric Acid.

Directions

Keep out of reach of children.
Store below 25°C.
Discard container 4 weeks after opening.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C
